name: Helpless Elf: Game Off 2022
description:
NOTICE: I forgot to add a bridge in the maze (cave part) so it's impossible to continue (just in case it you thought you were crazy!) I'm currently working on an updated version (link will be added here soon) Thanks for your patience and checking out my entry for the GameOff2022 jam!

Cliché used from list:  #1 (I know crazy right the first one!)
"'tis the season"*

CONTROLS: MOUSE (or touchscreen) to MOVE and INTERACT
(Alternatively you can use the ARROW KEYS to move and press, ENTER or 'Z' to interact; gotta love RPGMaker lol)

CREATED BY:
Imp Ent on RPG Maker MV (which is pretty obvious, sorry!

*The cliche is also based on all those holiday movies where Santa gets lost or loses all the presents or his sleigh breaks down and an unlikely hero has to help him!

Unfortunately, I suffered from a lot of restarting with new ideas (about every week, I would scrape my old idea and start again) So this crazy little mess was my latest [mistake] and I didn't have time to change my mind since it was the end of the jam!

Anyway, thanks for check this out and I'll have an update on the new version soon!

Thanks!
